title: Near Field Comuication (NFC)
description: This app does not collect any data device. Only use NFC to vefify that a correct 'Stamp' has been used.

title: Email Address
description: Addresses are only used to identify user for their order. No addresses are stored or passes on to third parties

title: Phone Number
description: Numbers are used to contact you regarding your order or unable to find address. No numbers are stored or passes on to third parties
